content.text:
# Vancouver Film Critics Circle Awards 2024

25th VFCC Awards
February 18, 2025
----
Best International Picture:
Anora
----
Best Canadian Picture:
My Old Ass
The 25th Vancouver Film Critics Circle Awards were presented on February 18, 2025, to honour the films selected by the Vancouver Film Critics Circle as the best of 2024.
The nominations were announced on January 20, 2025; the organization limits their number of nominees per category to three. For the international categories, Anora led the nominees with five, followed by The Brutalist, A Complete Unknown and A Real Pain with three nominations each. In the Canadian focused categories, Can I Get a Witness? led with eight nominations, followed by My Old Ass with seven.
Anora and A Real Pain won the most international awards with two each; the former won Best Picture. Can I Get a Witness? won the most Canadian awards with five, though My Old Ass won Best Picture.
